data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Zora from China (Araneae: Zoridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhu, Ming-Sheng, Zhang, Bao-Shi (2006): A new species of the genus Zora from China (Araneae: Zoridae). Zootaxa 1349: 47-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.174487
